Theme Description

On the date 07.07.07, the New 7 Wonders of the world were declared.

The Official New 7 Wonders of the World have been elected by more than 100 million votes to represent global heritage throughout history. We try to capture the beauty of these wonders and bring it to your desktop with The Seven Wonders Windows 7 Theme.

The Seven Wonders Theme consists of 25+ Hi-Res Wallpapers, Custom Monumental Icons and select sounds for a â€˜Wonderâ€™ful Experience on your Desktop.
